newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Rareco posts 18-month share loss, no dividend.
newsitem.headline: Rareco posts 18-month share loss, no dividend.

text.p: Full name: Rare Earth Extraction Company Ltd (venture capital)
NOTE - The results cover the period from January 1995 to June 1996 following the change in the year end from December to June. Comparative figures were not given.
The company said the financial staements had been qualified by auditors Deloitte & Touche.
The company said as a result of costs and delays in starting operations at Steenkampskraal, it would require additional capital which would be raised through a rights offer.
